snippet.title: Love Me or Die  📲 | OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
➡️ OUT NOW! 🔗 https://store.steampowered.com/app/3165520/Love_Me_or_Die/

Yuki, a lonely teenager, embarks on a desperate quest for popularity and fame. But her path soon turns into a dark and tragic journey that will change her life forever. A retro graphic adventure with challenging puzzles, intense tweet battles, and a pixelated world filled with humor and mysteries. 

#videogames #narrativeadventure #pointandclick #pointandclickgames #retrogaming #retrogames #aventuragrafica #graphicadventure #steam
